plot: Inside all of us is an angry dog waiting to get out and consume all of us. Are you going to feed the angry dog or starve him to death? How can you fight something inside of you?
title: Angry Dog
plot_es: Inside all of us is an angry dog waiting to get out and consume all of us. Are you going to feed the angry dog or starve him to death? How can you fight something inside of you?
plot_en: Inside all of us is an angry dog waiting to get out and consume all of us. Are you going to feed the angry dog or starve him to death? How can you fight something inside of you?
